medical_history.chief_complaint: Preimplantation genetic diagnosis for Sonic Hedgehog mutation causing familial holoprosencephaly.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The couple presented for preimplantation genetic diagnosis after having two children with clinical signs of holoprosencephaly. The second child, who had severe holoprosencephaly and cleft lip and palate, died shortly after birth. A five-year-old son had less severe symptoms, including microcephaly and other facial anomalies. Their growth and cognitive development have been reasonable but slow initially.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Two pregnancies resulted in children with holoprosencephaly; one child died, and another had noticeable symptoms. One previous pregnancy ended in spontaneous abortion due to Turnerâ€™s syndrome (45,X).
medical_history.family_history: The father has gonadal mosaicism for the SHH mutation, which appears to be a new mutation not inherited from the parents.
